citeinfo.origin: Department of Fisheries and Oceans, Institute of Ocean Sciences
citeinfo.title: Columbia River - Fish Passage

descript.abstract:
Measurement Details Daily counts of adult fish (by species) passing various sites (1962-present); hatchery releases (1995-present); Smolt Index (by species) (1985-present).
Custodian Columbia Basin Research (CBR) is a joint effort of scientific research projects through the School of Fisheries at the University of Washington under the leadership of James Anderson and John Skalski.
Base Internet/URL -- ( http://www.cqs.washington.edu/index.html ) ( http://www.cqs.washington.edu/dart/dart.html )
[ A TCODE project ]
